titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on Glycine, N,N-BisY2-hydroxy-3-(2-propenyloxy)propyl?-, monosodium salt, reaction products with ammonium hydroxide and pentafluoroiodoethane-tetrafluoroethylyene telomer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/6/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on Glycine, N,N-BisY2-hydroxy-3-(2-propenyloxy)propyl?-, monosodium salt, reaction products with ammonium hydroxide and pentafluoroiodoethane-tetrafluoroethylyene telomer.
